title: Solo Queue threads have become the first 'daily reminder' to ACTUALLY be daily.
body:
Just leaving this out here. Make of it what you will.

Edit: I wasn't advocating against DQ, simply showing the near-unanimity of the community on this issue.

Youtube, reddit, forums, pros.

i was talking the boards nothing else. 

>And those who dont voice their opinions dont matter.

Cause their is no reason to come to the boards? This is not some hot button debate. You guys are not even close to a majority. Tyler1 threads got way more upvotes. 

Silence in this case is the argument. You guys have 10% world wide of being upset. No one cares about 10%. You are 10%  that are loud annoying and still playing. Even if you left Riot would not even feel it. That is how little your 10% means.

Again, lets look at WOW and Runescape. What happened to them? At that time, again only those who were active in their communities talked about the negative changes. The others didnt.

And now the games are but shadows of past selves

Those who dont voice their opinions, never matter. Again, is there a reason to vote for the president?

Silence is NEVER an argument. And your percentages are just perfect, mind giving me the source?

Riots stance has been for years that things change in league. The game is not the same as Season 2,3,4 or what ever. Part of dealing with Riot is expecting and rolling with the changes. Those that can not adapt leave. 

Sure at some point Riot may push away enough people and the game may fail. Though i highly doubt that all 10% of the upset players are going to leave. Maybe a 1/4 of that will. 

Also the thing that you 10% forget, YOU COULD BE FUCKING WRONG HERE. Riot is making a choice they believe will have the greatest positive impact for them. You guys have no proof that Riot is wrong expect that other games have failed. Those other failures were for game play reasons not for pre-mades, so it does not translate into this discussion.

gameplay does not equall DQ.

Change is not a bad thing, when it is for the better, not for the worse. And such mindset of "Adapt or leave" is what kills many games. Again, Runescape and WOW.

10% - Still waiting for the source of this claim.

Also, we have logical proof of why Dynamiq is a bad system. These arguments are shown everywhere, just check the front pages and replies that people make. We are not using the fact that other games failed to say that Riot is wrong. We are using arguments to say why Riot is wrong. And using the fact that other games failed when they adopted "Adapt or leave" stances as to why they should not ignore players.

Let me ask you, why did Riot had to actively lie about returning soloq? Why did they purposefully mislead people into believing that they will bring it back to not bring it back later? Why are they refusing to add both ques at the same time to prove us wrong as the minority?

If we are the minority as you say, soloq should have went out and noone would have played it. Yet it was not released on purpose. Riot can so easily silence all of us and prove us wrong, yet they dont do this despite the fact that they then would garner positive image that would possibly increase their profits.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/d5WLfgiq-fact-check-around-11-of-the-global-player-base-is-really-pissed-at-riot-over-dq

>Also, we have logical proof of why Dynamiq is a bad system

Actually you have feelings on why not logical proof. There is a difference. You want, You think X should be a certain way, and You feel. None of that is proof.

>Let me ask you, why did Riot had to actively lie about returning soloq?

Cause they are terrible at PR and do not what they are doing? Like seriously no one has ever claimed Riot is good at messaging. Customer service wise Riot games is the worst company i have ever dealt with. I can give you a list of complaints about Riot.

I knew from day 1 that solo q could not work with dynamic. I could work out logical numbers (not going to way to much work) for you (others have in the past) but the 2 systems are not compatible with each other. The fact that people did not understand this when they made that stupid claim of solo q, is shocking. I do not think Riot lies, i think you have to be smart in order to lie, as a company they are stupid as fuck. Prefect case of lowest common denominator taking effect.

Link above showing Rioters thread on reddit. Go find the actual source, i hate that site.

> Missing Stats Check: What percentage of the global playerbase actually plays ranked significantly? How many of them have played X or more games every season?

Very important consideration.

> Argument Check: What percentage of the playerbase is actually aware what Dynamic Queue actually is? To this day, we still have people confusing it and the new champion select system.

Again very important consideration.

To say that percentage with so many unincluded variables is simply not correct. 

As well, that statistic doesnt show people who are for dynamic and those who dont care either way.

To add on, we know that Riot is prone to lying in many cases, and were extremelly shady with their "surveys" when implementing dynamicq.

And to finish off, how do they know what a global playerbase thinks? What metric did they use? 

Throwing out stats with no explanation of how they were collected, is useless, that is why scientific studies are open for reading and critique. Yet again, here we see a statement that is not supported by anything from a shady company that lies constantly.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Also, asnwer the question.

If we are the minority as you say, soloq should have went out and noone would have played it. Yet it was not released on purpose. Riot can so easily silence all of us and prove us wrong, yet they dont do this despite the fact that they then would garner positive image that would possibly increase their profits.

Why is that?

Answering to other of my questions would be preferable too instead off ignoring them.

>Answering to other of my questions would be preferable too instead off ignoring them 

I answer what i want, not what you want me to answer. I find a lot of your questions meaningless, so i do not bother with them. You are already entrenched in your beliefs. 

You are making wild claims with out proof.

>To add on, we know that Riot is prone to lying in many cases, and were extremelly shady with their "surveys" when implementing dynamicq.

Again you do not like so its a lie. Was not done the way you want so it is a lie. 

You really need to learn the difference between opinion and fact. 

Real story is that most people ~90% do not give a fuck.

That is not how a debate or a discussion works. You respond to all points given and if something is wrong you dispute them.

And what wild claims am i making? We dont know the metric they used to scout out the GLOBAL playerbase, we also dont know what considerations did they take in account when getting that percentage. There is again, a reason why studies are mostly open, so people could read if they were done correctly and fairly. 

We are given a percentage, when we are not shown how it was gotten.

And i may not like something, this doesnt make it a lie. However, when they said they will bring soloq, they were lying all those times. And their surveys were shady, as they used surveys that asked "Do you like playing with friends" to prove that DQ was wanted. When those two questions are not in any way related.

And again, those who dont care, dont matter, since they wont care either way, they wont care if its solo or dynamic. As such it should change by how those who care wish, because others wont give a fck anyways.

Instead of cherrypicking, which shows that you cant respond to arguments, respond to all of them. Unless you cant.

>That is not how a debate or a discussion works. You respond to all points given and if something is wrong you dispute them.

Except i am not asking you anything in return, I am also not RIot. I get to decide how much work i want to put into this conversation. A lot of what you asks bores me. You want to pay me (what i want, not what you want) then i will answer and give sourced information. Could take a few days but I could. 

>We are given a percentage, when we are not shown how it was gotten.

Really.... Really? Riot has account numbers totals and active player counts. I can take a wild stab at how they got their numbers. 

>And i may not like something, this doesnt make it a lie. However, when they said they will bring soloq, they were lying all those times.

It can make them a lot of things. They could be lying, stupid, or plan wishful and then wrong. You say lie; I will say the ones that post on the boards can not do basic logic and made claims that are out side their pay grade. 

>And again, those who dont care, dont matter, since they wont care either way, they wont care if its solo or dynamic. As such it should change by how those who care wish, because others wont give a fck anyway

When people are happy with current system they are not going to post (most of the time). You may notice a extreme lack of good job riot posts (thank god) over the years. Most people only post to complain. Also people have complained in past seasons that they wanted to have more people in Q. No one was on the boards back then saying Duo/Solo only.

So basically, you stopped debating. Alright. I didnt expect anything more from a dynamicq supporter anyway. Most of you do the same things, just cherrypick certain sentences instead of responding in a real fashion.

If you want my arguments and to continue the conversation look at the upper posts. If you dont, goodbye.

1.  How a discussion works is anyone can respond to whatever points they wish.  It could be any of them, or all of them.   They may refute said points or affirm them or go off on a tangent or just make a joke about something you said they thought was funny or whatever.   That's how a discussion works.  You don't get to dictate the manner in which someone chooses to respond.  

2.  It's easy to pop off and demonize Riot and accuse them of lying.  Far more likely is they fully intended to bring it back or thought that they could,  then realized that the two queues cannot coexist at platinum and above without totally horrendous wait times in both solo queue and dynamic queue.    But that wouldn't fit the narrative of Big Bad Riot.  

3.  I get the feeling that you don't think anyone that disagrees with you matters.   You are mistaken.  And even in a real election, which message board votes are not, those elected would be wise to remember that those that don't vote do matter because if the person elected messes up, they will be voting the next time.  For the person running against him.

1) I was in a debate club in my school and participated in national tournaments. I know what a debate or a discussion entails. You have to respond to all points given and refute them. If you dont, then the opposition wins the debate or a discussion by default because you are not responding to their statements.

2) Then why did they delay it over and over? I would believe that explanation if they did it at once or after the first delay. But not after so many delays and promises. Also, they arbitralily decided which queque to axe off instead of having natural selection by the players. This is another reason why i believe they always intended to not bring back soloq system.

Because they would have brought both back and then checked which one was more popular. If que times were their reasoning.

3) Those who  disagree matter, since they participate in a discussion. Those who dont, dont matter.And if they didnt care in the first place, who says that they will next time?

Don't forget to mention how untastable DQ made the stream comunity. All i see now are Pro Qing all together to avoid other players.

I loved watching Wings, Scarra, Valkrin AnnieBot ect. back in the day where they actualy would play against each other it was way more entertaining than this mess atm. Now most of them are just Smurfing and stomping games or just Qing together and stomping games. it's rly untastable.{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
There's no arguing with these emotional reactionaries. Let the mob be stupid and wail, as the mob will always do.

But he has a point.  People aren't going onto facebook, and forums, and reddit to say "good job riot", because its just a waste of a post.  Most people go to forums or other places to complain about something.  Just because the majority of the forums hate solo queue, doesn't mean the majority of the league community dislikes it.

Lol I love that logic - only people who "care" want Solo queue back.

Yessiree bob, sure is turning into a cult of opinion round here.

This isn't a democracy, these aren't elections. This is the mob of public opinion. You're just stretching REAL hard to make it seem that like opinions to yours are the only ones that matter/are correct.

Let me rephrase that for you:

"It shows up that on the **boards community** there is a committed group **in gameplay** that posts daily"

It does not mean that "the community" agrees on that, because the community is much more than boards.
It does not mean that the boards agree on that, because many avoid posting or even looking too much at Gameplay because is such a den on vitriol, rageposting and close-minded vision that only makes their day worse.

And this latter one should make you question how much to weight the matter at all, combined by the fact those posts mostly gather frustrated people.

This without even queationing if DQ is good or not.

Do those who dont vote in the elections matter in the elections? No. So those who do not express their opinion dont matter at all either. And we can see backlash everywhere. Videos with hounders of thousands of views, the downvotes on the Riot video. Reddit, these forums. Everywhere you go, people are against thei system, people who care to voice their opinions.

Here is an idea. If only a minority wants soloq, then why dont you give us both ques and then let natural selection take place? Oh wait, because dynamic NEEDS solo players to lessen the premade ques, thus using us like tools while making unfair games.

But they dont want to bring soloq back even as a secondary option. Why is that? IT would prove us all wrong if its not played. Unless Riot is afraid it would kill dynamic, which it would.

> [{quoted}](name=Dextix LT,realm=EUNE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=zYOn7Pjw,comment-id=00100000,timestamp=2016-07-06T11:09:24.399+0000)
>
> Do those who dont vote in the elections matter in the elections? No. 

You are confusing a civil duty to how to spend pleasure time, with the latter having no hardcoded decisional value. Are you really sure the confrontation stands up?

Yes, because im simply using an example. 

If people care about their country, they will vote and thus voice their opinions, if they wont, they dont care.

If people care about their game, they will voice their opinions, if they wont, they dont care

And since they dont care, we dont need to pay any attention to them and rather pay attention to the people who care.

Do you really think that people who do not reply to ever comment, every thread made by frustrated players are not caring about the game?

Or maybe they are too busy enjoying it?

A happy player might voice its opinion against another for few times, but is' not motivated to do so - it' s here to enjoy the game, not to cater to vitriol-filled players. If a player it' s happy about what it has then it is content, it does not feel the need to log on the boards and champion it' s cause. It can casually express its feelings and the dev can get it.
What happens in these kind of posts is not "caring". This is a fixation, this is tryharding. Which is understandable, but it does not equal passion, this equals only consuming time in a self-sustaining venting.

I don' t want to sound rude, but you are not the center of the world. A player that does not feel like you should not feel compelled to seek avenues where it can "fight" the opposition. There is no thing as such.

And this is true for everything, regardless wether or not the "soloQ back" discussion is right or wrong, regardless of my personal opinion too.

Just chill. I will say this only here and now - *it' s just a game*. Something we like, something we like to spend time on and gives us back good things, but not something that defines our whole life. Unless you are really deep and bound it with carreers and such, obviously.

If your point was right we would see threads praising dynamic over reddit, these boards. We would also see youtube videos praising dynamic q. Yet, we dont. Strangely enough....

All i am saying that its incorrect saying that all players who play the game like or support dynamic. They may just not care. Just like they didnt care where there was soloq.

So again, they should not even be considered in the equation, because they will like the game either way.

Yes, it is a game, but thats a shit argument. So what if its a game? OH yea, that means we shouldnt care, its just a game eh?

> [{quoted}](name=Dextix LT,realm=EUNE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=zYOn7Pjw,comment-id=001000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-06T14:21:32.192+0000)
>
> If your point was right we would see threads praising dynamic over reddit, these boards. We would also see youtube videos praising dynamic q. Yet, we dont. Strangely enough....

I actually said that satisfacted players feel no need to post too often because they are satisfacted, they have less impulse to do so of their own. And indeed there were praise posts. 
But as i said, people are not motivated to keep going giving praises because they are already satisfacted. Unsatisfied players, on the other hand, are quite the opposite. Plus, the latter tends to downvote other posts ( i am kidding... they don't  tend, they do) because they have in that moment a more aggressive mindset, abusing the vote feature to downvote what they don' t like ( like the few posts of those who praise the changes, that feel more and more aggressed upon and feel less and less prone to post).

because, again, you are not the center of the world. a player could just *don' t care about your opinion* and move on while letting you express your own. without downvotes or upvotes.

plus to the eyes of many praising Riot is downgraded as "whiteknighting" or "asslicking" aniway.

> 
> Yes, it is a game, but thats a shit argument. So what if its a game? OH yea, that means we shouldnt care, its just a game eh?

It was probably delusional to me to think you could understand without misinterpretating? as a game it' s important to us because it takes our time and passion, but it' s *just a game* because there are far more important things in life. It' s worth of our care, but not so much that we have to burn our liver over a part of it we don' t like.

And im saying that constant praise is not needed. Yet we didnt see almost any real praise. There is no need for constant praise of dynamic, but even when it went out, even before it went out, it was not received well. And noone really praised it in any way. Even in little ammounts it was not praised.

Voting system is for agreeing and disagreeing. Im getting annoyed by people who say that its being "abused" when its just an indication of opinion.

Praising riot is not degraded. It is degraded only when no sufficient reasons other than "adapt or gtfo" are given. Many people praise Riot, even i praise Riot in many of their good decisions.

And i did not misinterpret anything. Even in your current reponse, you again state "its just a game". Again, so what? So what if it is just a game? Enjoyment and entertainment is also an important life of people life. Not everyone is destined to be the next superhero or an astronaut, they choose what is important to them.

if constant praise is not needed, then you just repeated what i said before - people praised a lot of times DQ when it came out and casually after, but it went submerged by the downvoting horde of those who were not satisfacted with it.

That is abusing. You are using a tool devoted to control discussion to personal opinion instead; this is especially important in a medium where people go for a reason, like boards. people just want to be heard more if they want to vent. it' s natural.

Procedurally speaking, takes a whole lot more to read throught a post and see if it is upvote-worth rather midnlessly downvote it becase it talks an opinion opposite to yours, even by glancing at the title. And once you get a single downvote before anyone else can give an upvote, your post is doomed.

It' s not the only time it happened, like many other things after all.

Also yes you keep on misinterpretating, what i meant was not derogatory. Sorry if i can' t express myself better, but there are many things that can be said with the same pair of words and if you can' t manage to understand what i do mean even if i focus on it then my bad, but i lost my patience to explain it further.

But if they praised so much and they should be the majority, how did the get downvoted at the start? Again, going by your logic. Those who like the product will come, about one time to praise it. 

This means that at the start there will be a lot of them. But if they were overpowered by downvotes even at that time, this shows that people who dislike the system were still in the majority.

Again, how is it abusing the system if it is to agree or disagree with points? Thats the purpose of upvotes downvotes, agreeing and disagreeing, thus showing the forming consensus.

And yes, i agree that some people will upvote or downvote based on the title. But that will not be the majority, the majority will read, to look whether or not they agree. And having a downvote doesnt mean it will keep geting downvotes. Many off my threads in the old forums at first got downvotes, just to get upvotes later especially after an extended discussion.

Again, what am i misinterpreting when you keep repeating "Its just a game" Phrase. The only time it is EVER used is in a derogatory manner, when either making fun out of people and something they care about, or trying to show that something is insignificant.

You are trying to portray these arguments as unimportant because it is just a game, no worth losing sleep over it. Its in essence derogatory as it is downplaying peoples passions and giving them "Ratings" of what is "important" or not.

... dude. seems you do not even try to read my posts.

and i am not paid to deal with people dense like you.

Not a fair example/comparison, because elections are timed and everyone knows they take place. A random poll or thread here will not be announced to everyone playing the game. Only Riot can start a poll covering the entire player base and they can choose whether that would be mandatory before moving on to another gaming session.

I do agree with having both systems in place. I'm one for separate ranks for soloQ, duoQ, trioQ, 4Q and 5Q, maybe because of my background in FPSs, but it's not uncommon to brag about ranks/prizes in different team comps, per season/year, on one profile page.

> many avoid posting or even looking too much at Gameplay because is such a den on vitriol, rageposting and close-minded vision that only makes their day worse.

I'm about to just stay on Memes & Games because there aren't any productive threads to read anymore.
That' s why i posted here, that is Miscellaneous. even thought with this kind of thread there is still bias, of course.

If each daily reminder about "everyone" wanting solo queue back was true, they'd get more than the same 100 people up-voting them. 100 up-votes is a VERY small number of people compared to the league community.

Long story short, clearly not enough people want solo queue that much over dynamic queue otherwise that number would be hitting the thousands EASILY. Tired of seeing this solo queue stuff on the boards, let riot do what they want to do, if it loses you 100 people circle jerking the forums up-voting each other then that's how the world is. 

I'm ready to watch this get down-voted now so go ahead.

I don't think you know how the voting system works. Just because you see 100 upvotes doesn't mean only 100 upvotes were used; it's 100 more up than down. Could be 10000 downvotes and 10100 upvotes, you wouldn't know.

I feel like your post failed just off that.

or, or, simply put, people don' t use the vote feature for stuff they don' t feel hard on.

Downvoting is meant for shitposting and for not giving constructive content, but is used to aggressively take away voice who don' t share the opinion of the voter. Such aggression does not manifest equally, and manifests more on unsatisfied players since the satisfied ones are more prone to "let it go". And frustrated and angry players that talk about DQ are unsatisfied.

so yeah, it might as well almost be 100 upvotes dry.
